item.description:
Could it be that symbols of monetary reform were embedded in the most beloved children’s story of all time, The Wonderful Wizard of Oz?

Could it be that the symbols point the way out of our economic troubles today?


WINNER OF The Accolade Film Awards, Beloit International Film Festival, Silver Sierra Award, Louisville’s International Film Festival, International Film Festival: Ireland, Nevada Film Festival, Orlando Film Festival

Watch the trailer here:
http://www.youtube.co...

THIS FILM IS NOT TO BE MISSED! seriously.
Organic Refreshments will be served.
FREE

Please Join Us and BRING A FRIEND OR TWO!

group.name: FREEDOM IS FUNDAMENTAL Book Club and Discussion Group

item.name: THE SECRET OF OZ
